dc:title: Seattle, Portland, and Points South
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Lists all the people and groups she visited and spoke to in Seattle and Portland, describing their projects to help the poor and the worker.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 355 1940-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
